#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Create an Apartment Fit for a Professional
#Text=Many professionals choose apartment living over home ownership .
#Text=The flexibility that renting provides is a perfect solution for professionals in dynamic careers .
#Text=Access to transit services is close by or you can find properties right downtown !
#Text=And who needs the added stress of property taxes , building maintenance and bill after bill after bill when renting is so simple ?
#Text=Apartment living is clearly a great choice , but how do you turn those eggshell-white walls into a comfortable home to match your professional lifestyle ? It 's not as hard as you might think !
#Text=Steps
#Text=Read the lease or rental agreement .
#Text=What can and ca n't you do ?
#Text=Can you drill into the walls ?
#Text=Can you paint ?
#Text=Knowing your restrictions will help you determine what you can do .
#Text=If in doubt , speak with your building landlord before beginning any questionable projects – this could save you headaches down the road .
#Text=Add colour !
#Text=The walls are the background of your home and set the tone for each room .
#Text=White walls in apartments can make an apartment seem cold and institutional .
#Text=Make yourself feel truly at home by dressing up the walls .
#Text=If you paint , select a light or neutral colour .
#Text=Many lease or rental agreements require that you return the walls to their original colour when you move out .
#Text=Lighter colours are much easier to paint over than dark , bold colours and they can make small rooms look larger .
#Text=If you do n't want to paint , you can still dress up your walls with wall hangings , fabric , removable wallpaper boarders and stickers , stencils or artwork .
#Text=Create a theme .
#Text=A staple of a student apartment is mix-and-match furniture .
#Text=Professionals often hang onto these not-so-treasured heirlooms far longer than necessary .
#Text=Pull the room together by getting rid of those worn-out hand-me-downs and invest in furniture that compliments your style and taste .
#Text=Accent your room with decorations and colours that create unity .
#Text=Focus on functionality .
#Text=Apartment living is all about functionality .
#Text=Create a useful space that is also stylish by dressing up your storage space .
#Text=Unique wall-shelves make a statement and make use of vertical space .
#Text=Doors on cabinets and shelves create a clean and organized look by keeping otherwise cluttered looking items out of sight .
#Text=Know that less is more .
#Text=Clutter shrinks rooms .
#Text=When decorating a small space , chose a few key pieces and keep the knickknacks to a minimum .
#Text=Create the illusion of more space by choosing furniture and accessories that have clean light lines and let light pass through the room .
#Text=Use doors and dividers that are made from glass or mirrors .
#Text=Find furniture that has exposed legs and light materials .
#Text=Hanging lights , shelves and plants can increase vertical space and keep the floor from feeling heavy .
